summary.span: 充當基底類別，以定義通用於 命名空間 (Namespace) 上所有控制項的方法、屬性和事件。

span.span: Serves as the base class that defines the methods, properties and events common to all controls in the namespace.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供屬性、 方法和通用於所有的 Web 伺服器控制項的事件。The class provides the properties, methods, and events that are common to all Web server controls. 您可以控制的外觀和行為的 Web 伺服器控制項，藉由設定這個類別中定義的屬性。You can control the appearance and behavior of a Web server control by setting properties defined in this class. 例如，控制使用的背景色彩和字型色彩的控制項和屬性，分別。For example, the background color and font color of a control are controlled by using the and properties, respectively. 在控制項上可以顯示框線，控制項的框線寬度、 框線樣式和框線色彩藉由設定， ，和屬性。On controls that can display a border, you can control the border width, the border style, and the border color by setting the , , and properties. 會指定 Web 伺服器控制項的大小，請使用和屬性。The size of a Web server control can be specified by using the and properties. 可以設定特定的屬性，指定控制項的行為。The behavior of the control can be specified by setting certain properties. 您可以啟用和停用的控制項，藉由設定屬性。You can enable and disable a control by setting the property. 藉由設定控制索引標籤順序中的控制項取代屬性。The place of the control in the tab order is controlled by setting the property. 您可以藉由設定指定控制項的工具提示屬性。You can specify a ToolTip for the control by setting the property. > [!NOTE] > 並非所有控制項都支援這個類別中定義的每個屬性。Not all controls support every property defined in this class. 如需是否支援屬性的特定資訊，請參閱特定控制項的文件。For specific information about whether a property is supported, see the documentation for the specific control. > [!NOTE] > 這個類別中的某些屬性以不同的方式呈現，視瀏覽器。Some properties in this class render differently, depending on the browser. 某些屬性不會呈現，而其他人呈現，但是沒有任何作用。Some properties do not render at all, while others render, but have no effect. 屬性物件可以決定將 Web 伺服器控制項呈現的方式。The property of the object determines the way in which a Web server control renders. 瀏覽器支援 HTML 4.0屬性會包含一般物件，而大部分的內容將會使用來呈現 HTML 4.0 樣式屬性。For browsers that support HTML 4.0, the property will contain a regular object, and most properties will be rendered using HTML 4.0 style attributes. 不知道支援 HTML 4.0 的瀏覽器會使用物件。Browsers that are not known to support HTML 4.0 will use the object. 這會自動對應到任何相關的 HTML 3.2 標記屬性的樣式屬性。This will automatically map the style attributes to any relevant HTML 3.2 tag attributes. 在某些情況下，例如使用屬性的樣式屬性將會轉換成其他的標記，例如``標記。In some cases, such as with the property, the style attributes will be converted into additional tags, such as `` tags. 在某些情況下，會有沒有對應執行。In some cases, there will be no mapping performed. 針對特定的屬性在不同的瀏覽器中的呈現方式的詳細資訊，請參閱特定屬性的文件。For specific information about how a property is rendered in different browsers, see the documentation for the specific property. 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定 Web 伺服器控制項的鍵盤快速鍵。Use the property to specify the keyboard shortcut for the Web server control. 這可讓您來快速瀏覽至控制項的鍵盤上按下 ALT 鍵和指定的字元的索引鍵。This allows you to navigate quickly to the control by pressing the ALT key and the key for the specified character on the keyboard. 例如，將控制項的便捷鍵設定為字串`"D"`表示使用者可以巡覽至控制項，藉由按下 ALT + D。For example, setting the access key of a control to the string `"D"` indicates that the user can navigate to the control by pressing ALT+D. 只包含單一字元的字串所允許之屬性。Only a single character string is allowed for the property. 如果您嘗試設定這個屬性的值既不是`null`， ，或單一字元字串，發生例外狀況。If you attempt to set this property to a value that is neither `null`, , nor a single character string, an exception is thrown. > [!NOTE] > 只在 Internet Explorer 4.0 和更新版本支援這個屬性。This property is supported only in Internet Explorer 4.0 and later. ## Examples 下列範例說明如何設定和使用屬性控制項。The following example illustrates how to set and use the property of a control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要轉譯屬性和用戶端上 Web 伺服器控制項的樣式，一般都會呼叫並方法來插入每個屬性，並個別為樣式輸出資料流。To render attributes and styles for a Web Server control on the client, you typically call the and methods to insert each attribute and style individually to the output stream. 若要簡化此程序，這個方法會封裝所有呼叫和每個屬性和樣式的 Web 伺服器控制項相關聯的方法。To simplify the process, this method encapsulates all calls to the and methods for every attribute and style associated with the Web server control. 所有屬性和樣式會都插入到單一方法呼叫中的輸出資料流。All attributes and styles are inserted into the output stream in a single method call. 這個方法通常會覆寫由控制項開發人員在衍生類別中插入適當的屬性和樣式類別的輸出資料流。This method is typically overridden by control developers in derived classes to insert the appropriate attributes and styles to the output stream for the class. > [!NOTE] > 方法無法用來插入用戶端指令碼。The method cannot be used to insert client script. 若要使用用戶端指令碼，請參閱類別。To use client script, see the class. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立衍生自類別類別。The following example demonstrates how to create a class that derives from the class. 基底實作來新增屬性適用於衍生類別中覆寫方法輸出資料流。The base implementation of the method is overridden to add attributes appropriate to the derived class in the output stream. remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用屬性來指定 Web 伺服器控制項的背景色彩。Use the property to specify the background color of the Web server control. 此屬性設定使用物件。This property is set using a object. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性會呈現為只有特定控制項。This property will render for only certain controls. 例如， ， ， ， ，和會呈現此屬性。For example, , , , , and will render this property. 它也適用於，並如果其`RepeatLayout`屬性`RepeatLayout.Table`，而非`RepeatLayout.Flow`。It will also work for , and if their `RepeatLayout` property is `RepeatLayout.Table`, not `RepeatLayout.Flow`. 一般情況下，只會控制該轉譯成``標籤可以顯示的背景色彩在 HTML 3.2，而幾乎所有的控制項可以在 HTML 4.0 中。In general, only controls that render as a `
` tag can display a background color in HTML 3.2, whereas almost any control can in HTML 4.0.轉譯成的控制項``標記 (包括，則所有驗證控制項和清單控制項和其`RepeatLayout`屬性設定為`RepeatLayout.Flow`)，這個屬性可在 Microsoft Internet Explorer 版本 5 和更新版本，但不是在 Microsoft Internet Explorer 第 4 版。For controls that render as a `` tag (including , all validation controls, and list controls with their `RepeatLayout` property set to `RepeatLayout.Flow`), this property will work in Microsoft Internet Explorer version 5 and later, but not in Microsoft Internet Explorer version 4. ## Examples 下列範例說明如何設定的屬性控制項，它繼承自基底類別。The following example illustrates how to set the property of the control, which is inherited from the base class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定 Web 伺服器控制項的框線色彩。Use the property to specify the border color of the Web Server control. 此屬性設定使用物件。This property is set using a object. > [!NOTE] > 屬性會呈現僅限用於特定控制項。The property will render only for certain controls. 例如， ， ， ， ，和控制項將會呈現此屬性。For example, the , , , , and controls will render this property. 它也適用於， ，並控制項，如果其`RepeatLayout`屬性設定為`RepeatLayout.Table`，而非`RepeatLayout.Flow`。It will also work for the , , and controls, if their `RepeatLayout` property is set to `RepeatLayout.Table`, not `RepeatLayout.Flow`. 不過，它會轉譯為`bordercolor`屬性，它不是 HTML 3.2 標準的一部分。However, it is rendered as the `bordercolor` attribute, which is not part of the HTML 3.2 standard. `bordercolor`屬性適用於 Microsoft Internet Explorer 3.0 版或更新版本，但不是大多數其他瀏覽器。The `bordercolor` attribute works for Microsoft Internet Explorer version 3.0 or later, but not most other browsers. 當屬性未設定，在瀏覽器將使用其預設框線色彩。When the property is not set, the browser will use its default border color. 請參閱您的瀏覽器，以判斷其預設的色彩配置。Refer to your browser to determine its default color scheme. ## Examples 下列範例說明如何設定的屬性控制項，它繼承自基底類別。The following example illustrates how to set the property of the control, which is inherited from the base class. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic WebControl.BorderColor Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic WebControl.BorderColor Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic WebControl.BorderColor Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic WebControl.BorderColor Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定 Web 伺服器控制項的框線樣式。Use the property to specify the border style for the Web server control. 此屬性設定使用其中一種列舉值。This property is set using one of the enumeration values. 下表列出可能的值。The following table lists the possible values. |框線樣式Border Style|描述Description| |------------------|-----------------| |`NotSet`|未設定框線樣式。The border style is not set.| |`None`|無框線No border| |`Dotted`|點線框線。A dotted line border.| |`Dashed`|虛線框線。A dashed line border.| |`Solid`|實線框線。A solid line border.| |`Double`|雙實線框線。A solid double line border.| |`Groove`|凹陷框線外觀的溝槽框線。A grooved border for a sunken border appearance.| |`Ridge`|凸起框線外觀的脊狀框線。A ridged border for a raised border appearance.| |`Inset`|凹陷控制項外觀的嵌入框線。An inset border for a sunken control appearance.| |`Outset`|凸起控制項外觀的外圍框線。An outset border for a raised control appearance.| > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性將不會呈現在瀏覽器上早於任何 Web 伺服器控制項的 Microsoft Internet Explorer 4。This property will not render on browsers earlier than Microsoft Internet Explorer 4 for any Web server control. HTML 3.2 中的，沒有對等。There is no equivalent to it in HTML 3.2. ## Examples 下列範例說明如何設定的屬性控制項，它繼承自基底類別。The following example illustrates how to set the property of the control, which is inherited from the base class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定控制項的框線寬度。Use the property to specify a border width for a control. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性不適用於所有的 Web 伺服器控制項。This property does not work with all Web server controls. 它只套用至控制項，顯示為資料表，例如和。It applies only to controls that display as a table, such as and . 此屬性設為物件。This property is set with a object. 如果屬性包含負數時，會擲回例外狀況。If the property of the contains a negative number, an exception is thrown. > [!NOTE] > 框線寬度只以 Microsoft Internet Explorer 第 5 版之前的瀏覽器的像素為單位。The border width can be expressed only in pixels for browsers earlier than Microsoft Internet Explorer version 5. 在 Microsoft Internet Explorer 5 和更新版本的版本中支援所有的單位類型。All unit types are supported in Microsoft Internet Explorer version 5 and later. 請參閱特定的控制項，如需詳細資訊。Refer to the specific control for details. ## Examples 下列範例說明如何設定的屬性控制項，繼承自基底類別。The following example illustrates how to set the property of the control, inherited from the base class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可複製， ， ， ，和會呼叫這個方法，從 Web 伺服器控制項從指定的 Web 伺服器控制項屬性。The method copies the , , , , and properties from the specified Web server control to the Web server control that this method is called from. 這常用的情況下，Web 伺服器控制項的運作方式是以動態方式建立新的控制項，在轉譯正在使用的控制項。This is commonly used in cases where a Web server control works by dynamically creating new controls while it is rendering and using the controls. 此方法相當實用在此情況下，因為它會複製所有屬性的 Web 伺服器控制項不會由封裝物件，以便將它們放在最外層的控制項所呈現的標記。This method is useful in this situation because it copies all properties of Web server controls not encapsulated by the object so they can be placed on the outermost control of a tag that is being rendered.

span.span: is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用來建立樣式物件，在內部用來實作所有的樣式相關屬性。The method is used to create the style object that is used internally to implement all style related properties. 在衍生的類別可以覆寫這個方法，以建立適用於類別的樣式。Derived classes can override this method to create a style that is appropriate to the class. 這個方法主要由控制項開發人員使用。This method is primarily used by control developers. **附註**控制項開發人員應該會傳回衍生自傳回基底控制項。**Note** Control developers should return a that derives from the that the base control returns. 它不能假設屬於特定的樣式型別，因為衍生的控制項可能會傳回不同的型別。It cannot be assumed that the is of a particular Style type since a derived control may return a different type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定要在 Web 伺服器控制項的用戶端上呈現的 CSS 類別。Use the property to specify the CSS class to render on the client for the Web Server control. 這個屬性會在所有控制項的瀏覽器上呈現。This property will render on browsers for all controls. 它一律會呈現為類別屬性，不論瀏覽器。It will always be rendered as the class attribute, regardless of the browser. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). 例如，假設您有下列的 Web 伺服器控制項宣告：For example, suppose you have the following Web server control declaration: ``` ``` 先前的 Web 伺服器控制項宣告的用戶端會轉譯下列 HTML:The following HTML is rendered on the client for the previous Web server control declaration: ``` ``` 如果您使用階層式樣式表 (CSS) 來自訂控制項的外觀時，使用內嵌樣式或個別的 CSS 檔案，但非兩者。If you use cascading style sheets (CSS) to customize the appearance of a control, use either inline styles or a separate CSS file, but not both. 使用內嵌樣式和個別的 CSS 檔案，可能會造成非預期的結果。Using both inline styles and a separate CSS file could cause unexpected results. > [!NOTE] > 不支援設定的 CSS 的瀏覽器上屬性會有任何作用。On browsers that do not support CSS, setting the property will have no effect. ## Examples 下列範例說明如何使用要變更的樣式屬性控制項。The following example illustrates how to use the property to change the style of a control. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic WebControl.CssClass Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic WebControl.CssClass Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic WebControl.CssClass Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic WebControl.CssClass Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] [!code-xml[Classic WebControl.CssClass Example#1](~/samples/snippets/common/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic WebControl.CssClass Example/Common/source.xml#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定當控制項停用時，要套用至所轉譯 HTML 項目的 CSS 類別。

span.span: Gets or sets the CSS class to apply to the rendered HTML element when the control is disabled.

value.span: 當控制項停用時，應該套用至所轉譯 HTML 項目的 CSS 類別。

span.span: The CSS class that should be applied to the rendered HTML element when the control is disabled.

value.span: 預設值為 "aspNetDisabled"。

span.span: The default value is "aspNetDisabled".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可用來變更名稱轉譯為個別的 Web 控制項的屬性。This property can be used to change the name that is rendered for the property of individual Web controls. 根據預設，這個屬性會傳回"aspNetDisabled"。By default, this property returns "aspNetDisabled". 當要傳回的衍生類別中覆寫`false`的值屬性會呈現的值為`class`控制項之 HTML 項目的屬性。When is overridden in a derived class to return `false`, the value of the property is rendered as the value of the `class` attribute of the HTML element for the control. 在此情況下，如果沒有值，以在屬性，這兩個的 CSS 類別將會套用至轉譯的 HTML 項目。In that case, if there is a value in the property, both CSS classes will be applied to the rendered HTML element. `class`屬性的值將會包含屬性的值後面接著屬性，以空格分隔。The `class` attribute will consist of the value of the property followed by the value of the property, separated by a space. 這個屬性是靜態的這表示您可以設定它僅適用於類別。This property is static, which means that you can set it only for the class. 您將它設定為任何值使用於 Web 應用程式中的所有控制項。Whatever value you set it to is used for all controls in a Web application. 您無法指定不同的個別控制項的值。You cannot specify different values for individual controls. 如果您想要使用類別名稱"aspNetDisabled"的預設值不同，您通常可以將程式碼，該怎麼做`Application_Start`Global.asax 檔案中，如下列範例所示的方法：If you want to use a class name different from the default value of "aspNetDisabled", you typically put the code to do that in the `Application_Start` method of the Global.asax file, as shown in the following example: ```vb Private Sub Application_Start( ByVal sender As Object, ByVal e As EventArgs) WebControl.DisabledCssClass = "customDisabledClassName" End Sub ``` ```csharp void Application_Start(object sender, EventArgs e) { WebControl.DisabledCssClass = "customDisabledClassName"; } ``` ## Examples 下列範例顯示已停用呈現的 HTML控制何時屬性是`false`，當屬性具有預設值，以及當屬性是空的。The following example shows rendered HTML for a disabled control when the property is `false`, when the property has its default value, and when the property is empty. `Test` 下列範例所示的相同條件下呈現 HTML，不同處是屬性具有值"SampleStyle 」`:`The following example shows rendered HTML under the same conditions except that the property has the value "SampleStyle"`:` `Test` 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 屬性 (Property)。For more information, see the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當控制項的屬性設定為`false`，控制項通常會呈現暗灰色。When the property of a control is set to `false`, the control typically appears dimmed. 如果控制項是輸入的項目時，瀏覽器會防止使用者按一下或輸入它。If the control is an input element, the browser prevents the user from clicking or typing in it. 呈現伺服器控制項的 HTML 項目會標示為停用，藉由設定其`disabled`屬性或其 CSS`class`屬性。HTML elements that are rendered for a server control are marked as disabled by setting their `disabled` attribute or their CSS `class` attribute. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 與 。For more information, see and . 這個屬性會控制階層中向下傳播。This property propagates down the control hierarchy. 如果您停用容器控制項，也會停用該容器內的子控制項。If you disable a container control, the child controls within that container are also disabled. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 屬性 (Property)。For more information, see the property. > [!NOTE] > 在自訂複合控制項中，此繼承行為不適用於尚未建立其子控制項的控制項。In a custom composite control, this inheritance behavior does not apply to controls that have not yet created their child controls. 您就必須將啟用的狀態的子控制項時建立，或覆寫屬性來呼叫方法。You must either set the enabled state of the child controls when they are created, or override the property to call the method. > [!NOTE] > 停用控制項時，只會讓使用者透過瀏覽器 UI 控制項互動。Disabling a control only prevents interaction with the control by the user through the browser UI. 可以讓使用者以製作提交即使頁面上的控制項已停用由頁面處理回傳的要求。It is possible for a user to craft a request that submits a postback that is processed by the page even if controls on the page are disabled. 處理回傳要求之前，請先確定控制項已啟用並且可見。Before you process a postback request, check to make sure that the control is enabled and visible. 並非所有控制項都支援此屬性。Not all controls support this property. 請參閱 < 個別控制項，如需詳細資訊。See the individual controls for details. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列範例說明如何啟用和停用控制項，繼承自基底類別，藉由設定其屬性以程式設計的方式。The following example illustrates how to enable and disable a control, inherited from the base class, by setting its property programmatically. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic WebControl.Enabled Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic WebControl.Enabled Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic WebControl.Enabled Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic WebControl.Enabled Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指出是否啟用佈景主題，以供指定的控制項。The property indicates whether themes are enabled for a specified control. 當屬性是`true`，要套用控制面板中搜尋應用程式的佈景主題目錄。When the property is `true`, the theme directory for the application is searched for control skins to apply. 如果任何特定的控制項外觀的佈景主題目錄中，將不會套用面板。If no skin for the particular control exists in the theme directory, skins are not applied. 時屬性是`false`，則不會搜尋佈景主題目錄的內容不使用屬性。When the property is `false`, the theme directory is not searched and the contents of the property is not used. 控制項可以覆寫設定其父控制項或包含頁面的值。A control can override the value set by its parent control or the containing page. 比方說，如果父控制項的屬性設定為`false`，您可以選擇性地將佈景主題套用至藉由設定包含在父系的子控制項屬性設`true`上個別的子系控制項。For example, if a parent control has the property set to `false`, you can selectively apply themes to child controls that are contained within the parent by setting the property to `true` on the individual child controls. 在頁面、 容器或控制層級，就可以啟用佈景主題。Themes can be enabled at the page, container, or control level. 在頁面或容器層級停用佈景主題時，所包含的頁面或容器的所有控制項的佈景主題會停都用。When theming is disabled at the page or container level, themes are disabled for all controls that are contained by the page or container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定 Web 伺服器控制項的字型屬性。Use the property to specify the font properties of the Web Server control. 此屬性包含可存取子屬性宣告的形式`Property-Subproperty`(例如`Font-Bold`) 或以程式設計方式的形式`Property.Subproperty`(例如`Font.Bold`)。This property includes subproperties that can be accessed declaratively in the form of `Property-Subproperty` (for example `Font-Bold`) or programmatically in the form of `Property.Subproperty` (for example `Font.Bold`). 在 Microsoft Internet Explorer 的所有控制項的第 4 版之前的瀏覽器中，會呈現所有保留一個子屬性。All but one subproperty will render in browsers prior to Microsoft Internet Explorer version 4 for all controls. 它們是： ， ， ， ， ， ，以及(但只有名為字型大小，例如`Small`， `Smaller`，依此類推，運作)。They are: , , , , , , and (but only named font sizes, such as `Small`, `Smaller`, and so on, will work). > [!NOTE] > 雖然這些子屬性呈現在 Microsoft Internet Explorer 第 4 版之前的瀏覽器中，HTML 轉譯是不同於更新版本的瀏覽器。Although these subproperties render in browsers prior to Microsoft Internet Explorer version 4, the HTML that is rendered is different than later browsers. 而不是轉譯為樣式屬性，這些子屬性會轉譯為 HTML 項目，例如``和``。Instead of rendering as style attributes, these subproperties are rendered as HTML elements, such as `` and ``. 不會在所有控制項的舊版瀏覽器呈現一個子屬性是。The one subproperty that will not render on earlier browsers for all controls is . ## Examples 下列範例說明如何使用屬性，以蒐集字型資訊從控制項。The following example illustrates how to use the property to gather font information from a control. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定 Web 伺服器控制項的高度。Use the property to specify the height of the Web server control. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性不會呈現在瀏覽器中的所有控制項早於 Microsoft Internet Explorer 第 4 版。This property does not render for all controls in browsers earlier than Microsoft Internet Explorer version 4. 無法轉譯此屬性在較早的瀏覽器中的控制項包括， ， ，和任何驗證控制項。Controls that do not render this property in earlier browsers include , , , and any validation controls. ，並也不會呈現此屬性在較早的瀏覽器中時其`RepeatLayout`屬性設定為`RepeatLayout.Flow`。The , and also do not render this property in earlier browsers when their `RepeatLayout` property is set to `RepeatLayout.Flow`. 此外，只有單位類型的`Pixel`和`Percentage`舊版瀏覽器都支援。Furthermore, only unit types of `Pixel` and `Percentage` are supported in earlier browsers. 因為此屬性為非標準的 HTML，Web 伺服器控制項來顯示為資料表，例如和，不支援此屬性在瀏覽器中早於 Microsoft Internet Explorer 第 4 版。Because this property is nonstandard HTML, Web server controls that display as a table, such as and , do not support this property in browsers earlier than Microsoft Internet Explorer version 4. > [!NOTE] > 若要設定型別為單位的屬性而非預設值是`Pixel`，您必須建立新的單位類型特有的所需的單位類型。To set the property to a unit type other than the default of `Pixel`, you must create a new unit type specific to the unit type you want. 例如，若要將控制項設定屬性到 100 的百分比值，您可以執行下列動作：For example, to set a control's property to a percentage value of 100, you could do the following: > > `myWebControl.Width = Unit.Percentage(100);` > > 如需有關可用之單位類型屬性，請參閱類別。For more information on the unit types available for the property, see the class. ## Examples 下列範例說明如何以宣告方式設定的屬性控制項，繼承自基底類別。The following example illustrates how to declaratively set the property of the control, inherited from the base class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是唯讀屬性。This is a read-only property. 如果您想要停用的控制項，您將其屬性設`false`。If you want to disable a control, you set its property to `false`. 如果控制項不包含由另一個控制項，值屬性一律會是相同的值為屬性。If a control is not contained by another control, the value of the property is always the same as the value of the property. 屬性有不同的值屬性控制項是否為另一個控制項的子系，如果下列所有情況都都成立：The property has a value that is different from the property if a control is a child of another control and if all the following circumstances are true: - 值屬性或父控制項的屬性是`false`。The value of the property or the property of the parent control is `false`. - 的子控制項的屬性設定為`true`。The property of the child control is set to `true`. 在此情況下，子控制項會繼承父控制項的停用的狀態。In this situation, the child control inherits the disabled state of the parent control. 的子控制項的屬性會傳回`false`表示控制項已停用，即使未明確停用的子控制項已藉由設定其屬性設`false`。The property of the child control returns `false` to indicate that the control is disabled even though the child control was not explicitly disabled by setting its property to `false`. 父控制項本身可能會有其屬性設定為`true`但可能會停用的狀態會繼承其父代，依此類推。The parent control itself might have its property set to `true` but might inherit the disabled state from its parent, and so on. 當 ASP.NET 呈現伺服器控制項的 HTML 項目時，該標記的項目為已停用藉由設定其`disabled`屬性或其 CSS`class`屬性。When ASP.NET renders HTML elements for a server control, it marks the elements as disabled by setting their `disabled` attribute or their CSS `class` attribute. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 與 。For more information, see and .

summary.span: 儲存叫用 方法後已修改的任何狀態。

span.span: Saves any state that was modified after the method was invoked.

returns.span: 包含控制項目前檢視狀態的物件；如果沒有任何檢視狀態與控制項產生關聯，則為 。

span.span: An object that contains the current view state of the control; otherwise, if there is no view state associated with the control, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法主要由控制項開發人員使用。The method is used primarily by control developers. 檢視狀態是累計的伺服器控制項的屬性值。View state is the cumulative values of the properties for a server control. 這些值會放在自動伺服器控制項，也就是執行個體的屬性的類別。These values are placed automatically in the property for the server control, which is an instance of the class. 屬性值，然後會保存到字串物件的儲存狀態的伺服器控制項生命週期的階段之後。The property value is then persisted to a string object after the save state stage of the life cycle for the server control. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 網頁生命週期概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7949d756-1a79-464e-891f-904b1cfc7991)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Page Life Cycle Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7949d756-1a79-464e-891f-904b1cfc7991). 儲存檢視狀態時，此字串物件會傳回給用戶端做此變數會儲存在隱藏 HTML`input`項目。When view state is saved, this string object is returned to the client as a variable that is stored in a hidden HTML `input` element. 當您撰寫自訂伺服器控制項時，您可以藉由覆寫來改善效率方法，並修改伺服器控制項的屬性。When you author custom server controls, you can improve efficiency by overriding the method and modifying the property for your server control. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 面板控制項可以使用包含在一或多個面板檔案中的佈景主題的目錄。Skins available to a control are contained in one or more skin files in a theme directory. 屬性會指定其中一個這些要套用至控制項的面板。The property specifies which of these skins to apply to the control. 面板是專屬於特定的控制;您無法共用之間的不同類型的控制項的外觀設定。A skin is specific to a particular control; you cannot share skin setting between controls of different types. 如果您未設定屬性，控制會使用預設面板如果有定義。If you do not set the property, a control uses the default skin if one is defined. 例如，如果沒有面板識別碼定義控制項，則該外觀套用至所有控制，未明確參考識別碼的外觀，而且，不會設定為停用佈景主題。For example, if a skin without an ID is defined for an control, then that skin applies to all controls that do not explicitly reference a skin by ID and that are not set to disable theming. 如果已定義識別碼的外觀控制項，則該面板只套用至控制項設為該識別碼。If a skin with an ID is defined for an control, then that skin applies to only controls whose is set to that ID. 如果佈景主題目錄中的面板檔案未包含具有指定的外觀、在執行階段擲回例外狀況。If the skin files in a theme directory do not contain a skin with the specified , an exception is thrown at runtime.

exception.span: 屬性中指定的面板不存在主題中。

span.span: The skin specified in the property does not exist in the theme.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用來管理在 Web 伺服器控制項的外部標記中呈現的樣式屬性的集合。Use the collection to manage the style attributes rendered in the outer tag of the Web server control. 這個屬性會在所有控制項的所有瀏覽器上呈現。This property will render on all browsers for all controls. > [!NOTE] > 不支援的樣式屬性的瀏覽器將會忽略轉譯的 HTML。Browsers that do not support style attributes will ignore the rendered HTML. 透過強型別的樣式屬性設定的任何樣式值 (例如`BackColor="Red"`) 會自動覆寫對應的值，這個集合中。Any style values set through the strongly typed style properties (for example, `BackColor="Red"`) will automatically override a corresponding value in this collection. 在此集合中設定的值不會自動反映的強型別的樣式屬性。Values set in this collection are not automatically reflected by the strongly typed style properties. ## Examples 下列範例說明如何使用屬性來隱藏或顯示頁面上的控制項。The following example illustrates how to use the property to hide or display a control on a page. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic WebControl.Style Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic WebControl.Style Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic WebControl.Style Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic WebControl.Style Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示當控制項的 屬性為 時，控制項是否應該將呈現之 HTML 項目的 屬性設為 "disabled"。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the control should set the attribute of the rendered HTML element to "disabled" when the control's property is .

value.span: 一定是 。

span.span: Always .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在衍生類別中，此屬性會指示如何 ASP.NET 應該呈現 HTML 控制項的停用控制項時。In derived classes, this property indicates how ASP.NET should render HTML for a control when the control is disabled. ## 停用 ASP.NET Web 控制項Disabling ASP.NET Web Controls 當ASP.NET 控制項的屬性設定為`false`（也就是當控制項已停用），其目的是 ASP.NET 應該呈現該控制項在頁面中，但顯示在 停用狀態 （通常是呈現暗灰色）。When the property of an ASP.NET control is set to `false` (that is, when the control is disabled), the intent is that ASP.NET should render the control in the page, but display it in a disabled state (typically dimmed). 如果父控制項已停用，該控制項的子系也會顯示為已停用。If a parent control is disabled, children of that control are also displayed as disabled. 在此情況下，子控制項的屬性設定為`false`，即使其屬性可能會設定為`true`。In that case, the child control's property is set to `false`, even though its property might be set to `true`. 在 ASP.NET 3.5 及較早版本中，當控制項的屬性是`false`，ASP.NET 集`disabled`中呈現控制項的 HTML 項目屬性為"disabled"。In ASP.NET 3.5 and earlier versions, when a control's property is `false`, ASP.NET sets the `disabled` attribute to "disabled" in the HTML element that it renders for the control. 不過，可讓 HTML 4.01 標準`disabled`只能在使用者輸入會用於特定項目上的屬性。However, the HTML 4.01 standard allows the `disabled` attribute only on certain elements that are used for user input. 例如，`disabled`屬性所允許之`input`項目，但不適用於`span`項目。For example, the `disabled` attribute is allowed for `input` elements, but not for `span` elements. 大部分的瀏覽器支援僅顯示具有的項目已停用的預設外觀`disabled`屬性。Most browsers support a default disabled appearance for display-only elements that have `disabled` attributes. 不過，為了符合 HTML 標準，預設為 ASP.NET 4 中省略了無效的屬性。However, in order to comply with HTML standards, by default ASP.NET 4 omits invalid attributes. ## 如何使用 SupportsDisabledAttribute 屬性How the SupportsDisabledAttribute Property is Used 如果屬性是`true`，ASP.NET 會呈現`disabled`屬性停用控制項時。If the property is `true`, ASP.NET renders a `disabled` attribute when the control is disabled. 如果這個屬性是`false`，ASP.NET 會呈現`class`屬性停用控制項時。If this property is `false`, ASP.NET renders a `class` attribute when the control is disabled. 在衍生的類別覆寫這個屬性，以傳回`false`如果下列所有條件都都成立：Derived classes override this property to return `false` if all the following conditions are true: - 控制項會呈現 HTML 項目不支援`disabled`屬性。The control renders an HTML element that does not support the `disabled` attribute. - 屬性會指出低於 4.0 的 ASP.NET 版本號碼。The property indicates an ASP.NET version number lower than 4.0. 屬性不一定表示呈現控制項的 HTML 項目是否支援 （允許）`disabled`屬性。The property does not necessarily indicate whether the HTML element that is rendered for a control supports (allows) the `disabled` attribute. 如果控制項的屬性會指出 ASP.NET 版本號碼低於 4.0 中，控制項的值屬性可能會傳回`true`即使轉譯的 HTML 不支援`disabled`屬性。If a control's property indicates an ASP.NET version number lower than 4.0, the value of the control's property might return `true` even if the rendered HTML does not support the `disabled` attribute. ## 已停用控制項的回溯相容性Backward Compatibility for Disabled Controls 當您使用 Visual Studio Web 專案升級至 ASP.NET 4，從較早版本時，Visual Studio 會自動設定`controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion`Web.config 檔案中的屬性 (集合屬性) 的較早的版本號碼。When you use Visual Studio to upgrade a Web project to ASP.NET 4 from an earlier version, Visual Studio automatically sets the `controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion` attribute in the Web.config file (which sets the property) to the earlier version number. 因為屬性一律會傳回`true`當屬性為低於 4.0，這會導致 Web 控制項來呈現 HTML 控制項已停用，舊版本中所顯示的一樣。Because the property always returns `true` when the property is lower than 4.0, this causes Web controls to render HTML for disabled controls as they did in the earlier version. 如果您想要呈現 HTML 所使用的演算法，在 ASP.NET 4 中導入升級的網站時，您可以變更或移除`controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion`屬性。If you want an upgraded Web site to render HTML using the algorithm introduced in ASP.NET 4, you can change or remove the `controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion` attribute. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 屬性 (Property)。For more information, see the property. ## 使用 CSS 設定已停用的外觀Setting a Disabled Appearance By Using CSS 如果控制項的屬性是`false`而且控制項是停用 ASP.NET 集`class`屬性的值所呈現的 HTML 項目的屬性。If the property of a control is `false` and the control is disabled, ASP.NET sets the `class` attribute of the rendered HTML element to the value of the property. 預設值屬性為"aspNetDisabled"。The default value of the property is "aspNetDisabled". 若要提供的已停用已停用的控制項外觀，您必須定義類別的值所表示的 CSS 規則屬性。To provide a disabled appearance for disabled controls, you must define a CSS rule for the class that is represented by the value of the property. 控制項可能會有多個值呈現的 HTML 項目及其`class`屬性中的值是否其屬性。The HTML element that is rendered for a control might have more than one value in its `class` attribute if there is a value in its property. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 屬性 (Property)。For more information, see the property. ## Examples 下列範例顯示已停用標記控制項：The following example shows markup for a disabled control: `` 在 ASP.NET 3.5 和更早版本中，此標記會轉譯下列 HTML:In ASP.NET 3.5 and earlier versions, this markup renders the following HTML: `Test` 在 ASP.NET 4 中，如果值屬性為 4.0 或更新版本，而且如果屬性設定為其預設值時，相同的標記會轉譯下列 HTML:In ASP.NET 4, if the value of the property is 4.0 or greater, and if the property is set to its default value, the same markup renders the following HTML: `Test`

summary.span: 取得或設定 Web 伺服器控制項的定位索引。

span.span: Gets or sets the tab index of the Web server control.

value.span: Web 伺服器控制項的定位索引。

span.span: The tab index of the Web server control.

value.span: 預設值為 ，表示這個屬性尚未設定。

span.span: The default is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定或判斷 Web Form 網頁上的 Web 伺服器控制項的定位索引。Use the property to specify or determine the tab index of a Web server control on the Web Forms page. 當您按下`Tab`鍵，Web 伺服器控制項接收焦點的順序取決於每個控制項的屬性。When you press the `Tab` key, the order in which the Web server controls receive focus is determined by the property of each control. 一開始載入頁面時，會接收第一個項目專注時`Tab`按鍵是 [網址] 列。When a page is initially loaded, the first item that receives focus when the `Tab` key is pressed is the address bar. 接下來，Web Form 網頁上的控制項被定位的遞增順序，根據值從最小正數、 零值開始的每個控制項的屬性。Next, the controls on the Web Forms page are tabbed to in ascending order, based on the value of the property of each control, starting with the smallest positive, nonzero value. 如果多個控制項都共用相同的索引，控制項就會在 Web Form 網頁上宣告它們的順序接收焦點。If multiple controls share the same tab index, the controls will receive focus in the order they are declared on the Web Forms page. 最後，有的定位點索引為零的控制項被定位宣告它們的順序。Finally, controls that have a tab index of zero are tabbed to in the order they are declared. > [!NOTE] > 只有具有非零值的索引標籤索引的控制項將轉譯`tabindex`屬性。Only controls with a nonzero tab index will render the `tabindex` attribute. 您也可以設定從定位順序移除 Web 伺服器控制項屬性設為負數值。You can remove a Web Server control from the tab order by setting the property to a negative value. > [!NOTE] > 只在 Internet Explorer 4 和更新版本支援這個屬性。This property is supported only in Internet Explorer 4 and later. ## Examples 下列範例說明如何使用屬性設定頁面上控制項的定位順序。The following example illustrates how to use the property of the to set the tab order of controls on the page. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定當滑鼠指標停留在 Web 伺服器控制項時顯示的自訂文字。Use the property to specify the custom text that is displayed when the mouse pointer hovers over the Web server control. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性會轉譯為所有瀏覽器。This property is rendered for all browsers. 不過，只有 Microsoft Internet Explorer 會顯示這個屬性為工具提示。However, only Microsoft Internet Explorer will display this property as a ToolTip. 所有其他瀏覽器會忽略這個屬性。All other browsers will ignore this property. 此屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下列範例說明如何設定上的屬性控制項，它繼承自基底類別。The following example illustrates how to set the property on the control, which is inherited from the base class. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). summary.span: 讓控制項追蹤其檢視狀態的變更，以便將這些變更儲存在物件的 屬性中。

span.span: Causes the control to track changes to its view state so they can be stored in the object's property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法主要由控制項開發人員使用。The method is used primarily by control developers. 標示的起點，開始追蹤並儲存變更的控制項檢視狀態。The marks the starting point at which to begin tracking and saving changes to the view state for the control. 方法自動由 ASP.NET 呼叫初始化伺服器控制項時。The method is called automatically by ASP.NET when a server control is initialized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定 Web 伺服器控制項的寬度。Use the property to specify the width of the Web server control. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性不會呈現在瀏覽器中的所有控制項早於 Microsoft Internet Explorer 第 4 版。This property does not render for all controls in browsers earlier than Microsoft Internet Explorer version 4. 無法轉譯此屬性在較早的瀏覽器中的控制項包括， ， ，和任何驗證控制項。Controls that do not render this property in earlier browsers include , , , and any validation controls. ，並也不會呈現此屬性在較早的瀏覽器中時其`RepeatLayout`屬性設定為`RepeatLayout.Flow`。The , and also do not render this property in earlier browsers when their `RepeatLayout` property is set to `RepeatLayout.Flow`. 此外，只有單位類型的`Pixel`和`Percentage`舊版瀏覽器都支援。Furthermore, only unit types of `Pixel` and `Percentage` are supported in earlier browsers. 因為此屬性為非標準的 HTML，Web 伺服器控制項來顯示為資料表，例如和，不支援此屬性在瀏覽器中早於 Microsoft Internet Explorer 第 4 版。Because this property is nonstandard HTML, Web server controls that display as a table, such as and , do not support this property in browsers earlier than Microsoft Internet Explorer version 4. > [!NOTE] > 若要設定型別以宣告方式為單位的屬性而非預設值是`Pixel`，您必須建立新的單位類型特有的所需的單位類型。To set the property declaratively to a unit type other than the default of `Pixel`, you must create a new unit type specific to the unit type you want. 例如，若要將控制項設定屬性到 100 的百分比值，您可以執行下列動作：For example, to set a control's property to a percentage value of 100, you could do the following: > > `myWebControl.width = Unit.Percentage(100);` > > 如需有關可用之單位類型屬性，請參閱類別。For more information on the unit types available for the property, see the class. ## Examples 下列範例說明如何以宣告方式設定的屬性控制項，繼承自基底類別。The following example illustrates how to declaratively set the property of the control, inherited from the base class.
